calendar.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a set of pages that show the days, weeks, and months of a particular year, that you usually hang on a wall
calendar.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a book with separate spaces or pages for each day of the year, on which you write down the things you have to do
calendar.translation[0].definitions[2].d: all the things you plan to do in the next days, months etc
calendar.translation[0].definitions[2].e: an event that deserves a place on your calendar
calendar.translation[0].definitions[3].d: a system that divides and measures time in a particular way, usually starting from a particular event
calendar.translation[0].definitions[4].d: all the events in a year that are important for a particular organization or activity
calendar.translation[0].definitions[4].e: The Derby is a major event in the racing calendar.
calendar.translation[1].definitions[0].d: pages showing the days, weeks, and months of a particular year
calendar.translation[1].definitions[1].d: a book with separate spaces or pages for each day of the year, where you write down the things you have to do on each day
calendar.translation[1].definitions[2].d: all the events or dates in a year that are important for a particular organization, person, or activity
calendar.translation[1].definitions[2].e: The National Conference is the premier event in the Institute’s calendar.
On today’s economic calendar is the release of the December merchandise trade balance.
calendar.translation[1].definitions[3].d: one of the twelve months of the year
calendar.translation[1].definitions[3].e: Earnings have not exceeded £36,000 in any of the last 12 calendar months.
calendar.translation[1].definitions[4].d: a period of time from a certain date to the same date in the next month
calendar.translation[1].definitions[4].e: Payment terms are one calendar month from date of invoice.
calendar.translation[1].definitions[5].d: a period of time from January 1st to December 31st
calendar.translation[1].definitions[5].e: Italy’s financial year closes at the end of the calendar year.
calendar.translation[1].definitions[6].d: the year 2007,2010 etc from January 1st to December 31st
calendar.translation[1].definitions[6].e: Total domestic automobile demand in calendar 2006 remained largely unchanged.
